message: Let's be fair, Bob. This offer leaves us both with a good amount.
I think I deserve a bit more, considering the inflation!
The inflation is hitting you harder than me Bob, I'm offering a better deal than last round - take it or leave it.
Inflation is indeed hitting me harder, so I need a bigger share to make up for it!
Bob, let's be realistic. This offer is the best you'll get considering the inflation working against you. Take it before it's too late!
